constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: SB1  South of the Borough
NEIGH Name: South of the Borough
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions and installation of 1 x rooflight to front roof slope to facilitate loft conversion. Replacement of garage.
decision_conditions: The erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions and the installation of 1 x rooflight to front roof slope to facilitate loft conversion and the replacement of garage falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B, C and E of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

In dealing with the application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive way.  We have made available detailed advice in the form or our statutory policies in the Core Strategy, Supplementary Planning Documents, Planning Briefs and other informal written guidance, as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably.

Please provide a copy of revise existing and proposed block plan scaled 1:500, providing a scale bar showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site.  The block plan should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.The scale bar in the submitted existing and proposed site plans do not measure to scale. The submitted porposed site plan does not show the proposed development in hatched or shaded.
